sql.descr: Add IPv6 functionnality to blocks, subnets and interfaces tables
sql.query: ALTER TABLE `subnets` CHANGE `ip_addr` `ip_addr` DECIMAL( 39, 0 ) UNSIGNED NOT NULL;
ALTER TABLE `subnets` CHANGE `ip_mask` `ip_mask` DECIMAL( 39, 0 ) UNSIGNED NOT NULL;
ALTER TABLE `interfaces` CHANGE `ip_addr` `ip_addr` DECIMAL( 39, 0 ) UNSIGNED NOT NULL;
ALTER TABLE `blocks` CHANGE `ip_addr_start` `ip_addr_start` DECIMAL( 39, 0 ) UNSIGNED NOT NULL;
ALTER TABLE `blocks` CHANGE `ip_addr_end` `ip_addr_end` DECIMAL( 39, 0 ) UNSIGNED NOT NULL;
